text: i ordered this after reading alot of positive reviews.i like it so much i have it on autoship every month.i'm thinking of having it come every 2 weeks.i put it in almost everything i eat.what i have leftover i put on my hands.i feel like it is helping.i think more clearly and i think it helps my joints.in fact i ate it both on my breakfast and in my lunch today.it has a subtle coconut flavor that tastes good on almost anything.
